ValidationRule.description: This rule won't let a Opportunity be moved to the Ready to Submit stage unless it has a value in the Industry (Wizard)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Ready to Submit"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Underwriting"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Approved"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Agreements Sent"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Signed"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Funded"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Submitted") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry__c, ""), ISBLANK(Account.Date_Business_Established__c), ISBLANK( Account.Percent_of_Ownership_1__c ), ISBLANK( Account.Partner_1_Credit_Score__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before updating the Stage, you must enter the Industry (Wizard), Date Business Established, Credit Score(1) and % of Ownership(1) on the Account page.
